text: haey( khnhom mk nih) daembi banhcheak nouv avei del mean pimoun khnhom ampi kompir ta vr t ning daembi anounhnhat aoy puok anak nouv brakear muoychamnuon delke ban hamkhat mk leu puok anak . haey khnhom ban neamk bangheanh puok anak nouv mou chi hsaa t pi mcheasa robsa puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak kaot khlach a l laoh ning brate b tde tam khnhom
